extends java.util.Properties

Handles loading of configuration and modules. $Id: Configuration.java,v 1.6 2002/09/14 17:08:29 gray Exp $

Method Detail

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shuts down the XSS, but not the JVM. If non-daemon threads are alive, they will make the JVM live on.

restart

public void restart()
Makes an efford to restart the XSS. This is not a full restart and does not currently reload the configuration file.

Associated an initialized XML module with a tag and its optional authentication domain.

associateWildcard

public void associateWildcard(Module module,
                              java.lang.String auth,
                              java.lang.String authType,
                              java.lang.String authMethod,
                              java.util.Properties properties)
                       throws ModuleException,
                              java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                              java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
Registers an initialized XML wildcard module and its optional authentication domain. Note that wildcard XML modules can only require authentication to "filter" type authenticators as we wouldn't know if we should pass the calls to them since they don't have any tags associated to them.

ModuleException
java.lang.IllegalAccessException
java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
